sentence: Second, the nominee he backed for governor, Doug Mastriano, won the primary and if he wins the election in November, Mastriano would have considerable influence over how the state's presidential election results are handled in 2024 when Trump may be on the ballot as our colleague's Rosalind S. Helderman, Isaac Arnsdorf and Josh Dawsey explain.
author: Theodoric Meyer
title: Trump uses Pa. primary to continue effort to undermine electoral system
